text:
The Kardashians are known for their elaborate birthday celebrations. Even the youngest members of their growing brood experience extravagant parties they’ll likely never remember. Case in point: Saint West and Reign Disick's joint birthday party. Kim Kardashian West recently shared photos to Snapchat of the cousins’ “Monster Mash”-themed birthday party, and we of course noticed the little ones’ perfectly decorated Monsters Inc.-inspired cakes. (That’s right, plural because toddlers each need their own cake in this family.)

Crafted by Hansen’s Cakes in Los Angeles — the century-old bakery where the Kardashians get all their cakes — the birthday desserts were personalized odes to popular Monsters Inc. characters. Per Kardashian West’s Snapchat, Saint, who turned two years old on December 5, had a Mike Wazowski-topped cake, while his soon-to-be-three-year-old cousin Reign’s cake featured none other than Sulley.

Photo: @KimKardashian/Instagram

Each of the cakes was similar at the base and complemented other aspects of the “Merry Monster Mash” festivities, which included ice skating, faux snow, and a Santa visit. Sigh. Life as a baby Kardashian is sweet!
title: See the Matching Cakes Saint West and Reign Disick Got for Their Joint Birthday Party
